mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ( TO_CHAR( RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AS RESERVE_DATE FROM RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM WHERE RESERVE_AVAILABLE = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT ( TO_CHAR( RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AS RESERVE_DATE FROM RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM MINUS SELECT DISTINCT ( TO_CHAR( RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AS RESERVE_DATE FROM RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM WHERE RESERVE_AVAILABLE = 'Y'

SELECT RES.RESERVE_CODE , RESERVE_USER_ID , RESERVE_NAME , RESERVE_COMMENT , (SELECT ROOM_NAME FROM MEETING_ROOM WHERE ROOM_CODE = RES.ROOM_CODE ) AS ROOM_CODE , TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVE_DATE , RESERVE_TIME FROM RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM RES WHERE RESERVE_USER_ID = #{userId} AND TO_DATE(RESERVE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') >= SYSDATE ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE
mapper.delete: UPDATE RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM SET RESERVE_USER_ID = '' , RESERVE_NAME = '' , RESERVE_AVAILABLE = 'Y' WHERE RESERVE_CODE = #{reserveCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_CODE , ROOM_NAME , AVAILABLE FROM MEETING_ROOM

SELECT R.ROOM_CODE , ROOM_NAME , RESERVE_CODE , RESERVE_USER_ID , RESERVE_NAME , RESERVE_COMMENT , TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVE_DATE , RESERVE_TIME , RESERVE_AVAILABLE FROM MEETING_ROOM M , RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM R WHERE M.ROOM_CODE = R.ROOM_CODE
AND RESERVE_AVAILABLE = 'N'
SELECT DISTINCT RESERVE_DATE FROM RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM WHERE RESERVE_AVAILABLE = 'N'

SELECT M.ROOM_CODE , ROOM_NAME , AVAILABLE , RESERVE_CODE , RESERVE_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVE_DATE , RESERVE_TIME , RESERVE_AVAILABLE FROM MEETING_ROOM M , RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM R WHERE M.ROOM_CODE = R.ROOM_CODE AND RESERVE_DATE = #{reserveDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(RESERVE_CODE)) + 1, 0) FROM RESERVATION_MEETING_ROOM) , '' , '' , '' ,#{roomCode} ,TO_DATE( #{day} ,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,#{time} ,'Y')
